          <title>
            <string language="hu">Mi a szín?</string>
            <string language="en">What is colour?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ist Farbe?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle est couleur ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que é cor?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è colore?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι είναι χρώμα;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es color?</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szín fizikája, pigmentek, festékanyagok</string>
            <string language="en">physics, pigments, painting materials of colour</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">színtan,  színelmélet,  pigment,  </string>
            <string language="en">study of colour, colour theory, pigment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik, Pigmente, malende Materialien der Farbe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique, colorants, matériaux peignants de couleur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física, pigments, materiais pintando da cor</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica, pigmenti, materiali di verniciatura di colore</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική, χρωστικές ουσίες, υλικά ζωγραφικής του 
χρώματος</string>
          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studie der Farbe, Farbe Theorie, Pigment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">étude de couleur, théorie de couleur, colorant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estudo da cor, teoria da cor, pigment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">studio su colore, teoria di colore, pigmento</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
